title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on HSW Races
content:
Looking to join the street racing elite? Get access to prime performance upgrades by listening for a call from Hao on your iFruit. Once you prove yourself, head to the Los Santos Car Meet to take advantage of the unique customizations Hao’s Special Works has to offer.

After Hao’s finished his tweaks, put your upgraded rides to the test in HSW Races — paying out 3X GTA$ and RP across all 20 tracks.

Completing any 3 Races this week will get you a GTA$200,000 bonus.
